title: Leisure Suit Larry 7 - Love for Sail (PC - GOG)
description:
LEISURE SUIT LARRY: LOVE FOR SAIL!

DRM-Free GOG version

Release Date: December 31, 1996

Compatible With: Windows (XP,Vista,7,8)

Minimum system requirements: 
Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8, 
1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended), 
512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 
3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 
(compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 
Mouse, Keyboard. 

Compatibility notice: Leisure Suit Larry: Love For Sail! 
must be installed on the C: drive.

Languages: 
* Audio and Text: English, French, German
* Text Only: Spanish

Game Modes: Single Player

Genre:  adventure / point-and-click / puzzle 

Bonus Content Included: 6 avatars, Cyber Sniff 2000, Manual, Wallpaper

Q: Cyber Sniff 2000... the hell's that?

A: A sheet of numbered scratch-and-sniff paper, corresponding to a number 
displayed on the screen at a certain location, so that the player could get 
a scent of what the area the player was in smelled like. (It loses some, eh...
all of its original charm as a digital file :))

Overview:

rather sticky situation. Not one to be tied down, Larry makes the best of things
